name: School Bus Crash Demolition: Derby Racing Bus Chase Simulator
name_original: School Bus Crash Demolition: Derby Racing Bus Chase Simulator
description: Do you want to become the extreme demolition derby crash racing winner? It’s time to take your school bus driving simulation towards the off road and compete in one of the lethal death road motor racing and school bus racing games. It’s time for death road motor racing inside the demolition derby crash racing ground. Challenge your ferocious driving skills in the most hazardous school bus driving simulation game ever to be released! Smash into other opponent school buses, jump and drift on road side ramps and crash your dangerous enemies in the modern school bus racing games. Smell the petrol fumes and enjoy the carnage in DEMOLITION DERBY: SCHOOL BUS CRASH 3D 2016.
